urls.title: Upper Kent | The Flood Hub
urls.description: The Environment Agency is delivering a proposed Flood Risk Management Sc heme to better protect homes and business from flooding in the Kent catchment, and improve the local environment and community amenities. Kendal is the first area to be delivered, followed by Burneside, Staveley, and Ings, and upstream measures including flood storage. In addition, Natural Flood Management measures are being integrated into the plans which aim to slow the flow of water and provide wider environmental benefits across

tweets.text:

tweets.text: @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK This is not ok! Do something about it! #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/97U51nNySu

It's #WorldWaterDay! üèä‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
I've celebrated with a swim at Warleigh Weir. We're working with @Sewagefreeswim, @EnvAgency & @wessexwater to make this popular spot a designated bathing water. Find out more about the cause in our new #SewageInOurRivers üí© report:
https://t.co/3XCVssodQN https://t.co/d9GKXtmbTm

@jon_neville39 @HamptonSchool @HamptonRowing @science_hampton @TheHamptonite Oh no! That‚Äôs not good news. Not sure of the location but it might be worth reporting to your local wildlife trust? Mink wiped out our water vole population, they have such a devastating affect.

Are you frightened to open a window @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @BorisJohnson @Keir_Starmer @DefraGovUK ? I am. I want to sleep but my unventilated house is full if stale, eggy, toxic, air because of the stench from Walleys Landfill and outside the air is poison. #stopthestink
@Loz__Spencer @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 I would like to know this for you, your neighbours and all those poor kids who are being affected yet again by things out of their control

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2  Sure you‚Äôd love it a fine wouldn‚Äôt you?? You are despicable!! You owe the entire borough of Newcastle and outlying areas an apology, no compensation though, just close that stink stitch down, your complacency and arrogance is disgusting

@PurpleRiver_Dev @Sewagefreeswim @EnvAgency @wessexwater @theriverstrust I will definitely remember to take my neoprene gloves next time. Spring is here, but the water temperature hasn't caught up yet! ü•∂

@JamesMi36448366 @EnvAgency I think your referring to the Met office. Anyway, it is hydrological possible for a catchment to experience an increase in precipitation and water scarcity #ClimateConcerned #ClimateChange #ClimateActNow

@scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe Don‚Äôt forget the significant breach of turning off the gas wells for days at a time because they don‚Äôt want to pay anyone to run them when they are closed. Forever cutting corners eh @RedIndustries2

@EnvAgencyMids Can I report mismanagement of Walleys Landfill? You already have 1000‚Äôs of complaints each month telling you this. What‚Äôs the penalty for a minor & a significant breach of @RedIndustries2 permit? Is it a Prosecution? A fine?A closure?When will you act? @StinkStopthe #stopthestink
@AnnekaFrance @Sewagefreeswim @EnvAgency @wessexwater @theriverstrust You look a touch cold! Love that you've managed to put a smile on your face for the photo!

urls.title: Corby man jailed and facing costs of ¬£750,000 for waste crime
urls.description: A Northamptonshire man, who was jailed in January, after a decade of waste offences was ordered this week to pay ¬£12,500 in costs and ¬£140 in victim surcharge.

tweets.text:
Burning, burying and stockpiling waste without the correct permit is #illegal‚ö†Ô∏è

A Northamptonshire man was fined ¬£12,500 and jailed for breaching many environmental laws.

If you suspect any illegal waste activity call: 0800 80 70 60

More info: https://t.co/cksMMi14Qt https://t.co/lPH0BW1iJL

urls.title: Living with Water appoints Stantec to deliver Blue-Green Plan for Hull | Living With Water
urls.description: Living with Water appoints Stantec to deliver Blue-Green Plan for Hull and East Riding. Read the full story to find out more. Keep up-to-date with the latest news from Living With Water.

tweets.text:
#WorldWaterDay #WATERNEWS

Living with Water appoints @Stantec  to deliver Blue-Green Plan for Hull and East Riding. 

https://t.co/Goylxr6tZu
@ERfloodrisk @Hullfloodrisk @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater @Hullccnews @East_Riding
@EnvAgencyMids So what‚Äôs the difference between this and Whaley‚Äôs Landfill?
@EnvAgencyMids This tweet is a bit rich don't you think? #stopthestink

Our Short Ferry Field Team has planted 1000 native hedgerow whips at Broxhome to replace gaps in a hedge lost over the years.

#environment #trees https://t.co/pkSQpmgK3p

@EnvAgencyMids So when are you going to do something about @RedIndustries2 and Walley‚Äôs landfill? I can't take my Son's to the park because of the smell making us bad and my eldest doesn't even get a break from it because it stinks at his school

@EnvAgencyMids Stop pretending you care about breaches of environmental laws. If you did, definitive action against @RedIndustries2 would‚Äôve occurred by now and Walley‚Äôs Quarry would‚Äôve been sealed off.

@_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @AireIncinerator @EnvAgency Please stop bending the truth. It's unbecoming of our MP. They're not "@bradfordmdc's plans". They just approved it... which is bad enough anyway if you want to score political points against a Labour controlled Council. So why the need to post misleading inaccuracies?

Delighted to have secured a debate in Parliament next week on the campaign to stop @bradfordmdc council's plans for an incinerator on the outskirts of #Keighley.

Despite top campaigning by the @AireIncinerator team, the @EnvAgency granted permission last year.üëé
